text: The torrent salamander is a species of salamanders. They are also known as Cascade salamanders. They are part of the family Rhyacotritonidae. They live in the Pacific Northwest. The genus is divided into four species *Cascade Torrent Salamander (Rhyacotriton cascadae) *Columbia Torrent Salamander (Rhyacotriton kezeri) *Olympic Torrent Salamander (Rhyacotriton olympicus) *Southern Torrent Salamander (Rhyacotriton variegatus) ==Other websites== * Tree of Life: Rhyacotritonidae Category:Salamanders
title: Torrent salamander
